mapper.insert:
insert into ticket ( ticket_no, ticket_num, ticket_date, bef3_max_count, mid3_max_count, aft3_max_count, max_count, line ) values
( #{ticket.ticketNo}, #{ticket.ticketNum}, #{ticket.ticketDate}, #{ticket.bef3MaxCount}, #{ticket.mid3MaxCount}, #{ticket.aft3MaxCount}, #{ticket.maxCount}, #{ticket.line} )
